Flocking Class Reference

Detailed Description

Flocking Implementation of a flocking goal. This goal mimics the flocking behavior of birds and schooling behavior of fish.

void Flocking::PreUpdate ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called before each Update call to perform pre-processing. Does nothing for this goal.

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
Goal::PreUpdate

Reimplemented from Goal.

void Flocking::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called each frame to update this goal. Updates flocking targets and determines the best velocity to flock with them (Avoidance + Matching + Centering).

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
Goal::Update

Reimplemented from Goal.

This method is called after each Update call to perform post-processing. Does nothing for this goal.

) [protected]

u32  NumTargets,
Math::Vector3 &  Result
